suite.name: Amazon

test.name: Logged out user can search for products

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Xbox Series X Console' into text field 'id=twotabsearchtextbox'.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.name: Logged out user can view a product

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Xbox Series X Console' into text field 'id=twotabsearchtextbox'.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Product Link
kw.doc: Clicks on the first product in the search results list

kw.name: Click Link
kw.arg: css=#search > div.s-desktop-width-max.s-desktop-content.s-opposite-dir.sg-row > div.s-matching-dir.sg-col-16-of-20.sg-col.sg-col-8-of-12.sg-col-12-of-16 > div > span:nth-child(4) > div.s-main-slot.s-result-list.s-search-results.sg-row > div:nth-child(8) > div > div > div > div > div > div.sg-col.sg-col-4-of-12.sg-col-8-of-16.sg-col-12-of-20.s-list-col-right > div > div > div.a-section.a-spacing-none.s-padding-right-small.s-title-instructions-style > h2 > a
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking link 'css=#search > div.s-desktop-width-max.s-desktop-content.s-opposite-dir.sg-row > div.s-matching-dir.sg-col-16-of-20.sg-col.sg-col-8-of-12.sg-col-12-of-16 > div > span:nth-child(4) > div.s-main-slot.s-result-list.s-search-results.sg-row > div:nth-child(8) > div > div > div > div > div > div.sg-col.sg-col-4-of-12.sg-col-8-of-16.sg-col-12-of-20.s-list-col-right > div > div > div.a-section.a-spacing-none.s-padding-right-small.s-title-instructions-style > h2 > a'.

Link with locator 'css=#search > div.s-desktop-width-max.s-desktop-content.s-opposite-dir.sg-row > div.s-matching-dir.sg-col-16-of-20.sg-col.sg-col-8-of-12.sg-col-12-of-16 > div > span:nth-child(4) > div.s-main-slot.s-result-list.s-search-results.sg-row > div:nth-child(8) > div > div > div > div > div > div.sg-col.sg-col-4-of-12.sg-col-8-of-16.sg-col-12-of-20.s-list-col-right > div > div > div.a-section.a-spacing-none.s-padding-right-small.s-title-instructions-style > h2 > a' not found.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.status: Link with locator 'css=#search > div.s-desktop-width-max.s-desktop-content.s-opposite-dir.sg-row > div.s-matching-dir.sg-col-16-of-20.sg-col.sg-col-8-of-12.sg-col-12-of-16 > div > span:nth-child(4) > div.s-main-slot.s-result-list.s-search-results.sg-row > div:nth-child(8) > div > div > div > div > div > div.sg-col.sg-col-4-of-12.sg-col-8-of-16.sg-col-12-of-20.s-list-col-right > div > div > div.a-section.a-spacing-none.s-padding-right-small.s-title-instructions-style > h2 > a' not found.
